docs.title: Welcome
docs.text: Hello! I am an AI/ML Engineer passionate about building intelligent systems.

docs.title: About Me
docs.text:
I specialize in:

  • Machine Learning: Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning, NLP
  • Data Engineering: Pipelines, ETL, Big Data
  • Deployment: CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, Cloud (AWS/GCP/Azure)

I use Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, and modern MLOps tools to bring models from research to production.

View My Projects{ .md-button .md-button--primary } Read My Resume{ .md-button }

docs.title: Projects
docs.text: Here are some of the projects I've worked on.

docs.title: 🧠 Generative AI Chatbot
docs.text:
A RAG-based chatbot that answers questions from custom documentation.

  • Stack: Python, LangChain, OpenAI API, FAISS
  • Key Features: Contextual understanding, source citation.
# Example snippet from the bot
def get_response(query):
    docs = vector_store.similarity_search(query)
    chain = load_qa_chain(llm, chain_type="stuff")
    return chain.run(input_documents=docs, question=query)

docs.title: 👁️ Computer Vision Traffic Analyzer
docs.text:
Real-time object detection model to count vehicles and analyze traffic flow.

  • Stack: YOLOv8, OpenCV, PyTorch
  • Key Features: Real-time inference on edge devices.

(Replace with your actual project image)

docs.title: 📈 Stock Price Predictor
docs.text:
Time-series forecasting using LSTM networks to predict stock trends.

  • Stack: TensorFlow, Pandas, Scikit-learn
  • Results: Achieved 85% directional accuracy on test set.

\(f(t) = \sigma(W_f \cdot [h_{t-1}, x_t] + b_f)\)

View on GitHub{ .md-button }

docs.title: Senior ML Engineer | Tech Corp
docs.text:
2023 - Present

  • Led a team of 4 engineers to deploy a recommendation engine serving 1M+ users.
  • Reduced model inference latency by 40% using quantization.

docs.title: AI Researcher | University Lab
docs.text:
2021 - 2023

  • Published 2 papers on Natural Language Understanding at NeurIPS.
  • Developed a novel attention mechanism for transformer models.

docs.title: Skills
docs.text:
• Languages: Python, C++, SQL
  • Frameworks: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn
